summary: A simple touch up/repaint giving Alduin a look inspired by World of Warcraft's, Deathwing.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=5][b]PLEASE CHECK OUT THE NEW 2015 VERSION![/b][/size][/color][/center]

A simple touch up/repaint giving Alduin a look inspired by World of Warcraft's, Deathwing. This mod is a replacer for Alduin. It changes Alduins texture to be slightly Deathwing-esque and his model has been edited to give the shader more of a Black Dragon look.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
Installation:

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the files of the archive to your Skyrim Data Folder

meshes/actors/alduin
textures/actors/alduin

This will overwrite the default Alduin. If you are using any other Alduin mod, this will replace it.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
Uninstall Instructions:

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files/folders:

meshes/actors/alduin
textures/actors/alduin

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][color=yellow][b]
Please check out my other mods![/b][/color]
